title: CepVersionInfo
description: Version information for CEP schemas, vocabularies, and related specifications.

specVersion.description: Version identifier for the CEP specification.

coreSchemaVersion.description: Version identifier for the core CEP schemas.

vocabularyVersion.description: Version identifier for the vocabulary schemas.

ceeVersion.description: Version identifier for the CEE extension, if applicable.

releasedAt.description: Timestamp when this version bundle was released.
